SEARCH
Package it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.control

Interface IDeadlineService

All Superinterfaces:
ICrudService<Deadline,Long>
All Known Implementing Classes:
DeadlineServiceImpl
public interface IDeadlineService extends ICrudService<Deadline,Long>
Service contract for deadlines.

Extends the generic CRUD and adds a couple of domain-specific operations, plus a tiny read-model projection via rows(). The API is intentionally small and boring by desing.

    Methods inherited from interface it.unicam.cs.mpgc.jbudget125576.control.ICrudService

    deleteById, findAll

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(DeadlineCreate create)
      Creates and persists a new Deadline from a compact DTO. Validation should already happen in the DTO constructor; here we just map fields.
      Parameters:
      create - input data; must not be null
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if business rules are violated

    • togglePaid

      void togglePaid(Long id)
      Atomically flips the paid flag of the target deadline.
      Parameters:
      id - the identifier of the deadline to toggle
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the deadline cannot be found

    • rows

      List<DeadlineRow> rows()
      UI-friendly projection (does not clash with ICrudService.findAll() from CRUD). Each row contains formatted text fields ready for a simple table.
      Returns:
      a list of DeadlineRow; never null
